txt.en: Upon the frozen lake of Eiglinn, you have discovered countless shadow-grims summoned forth by the remnants of the Iron Crown's sorcery in Câr Bronach. If the way through Câr Bronach is ever to be made safe for travellers, these shadow-grims must be banished and the pollution of Eiglinn by the Iron Crown must be undone.\n\nYou should defeat shadow-grims at Eiglinn.
From the tainted lake of Eiglinn and other pools of spell-dross, shadow-grims have risen from the remnants of the Iron Crown's fell sorcery in Câr Bronach.
You have defeated many shadow-grims at Eiglinn.
Although it shall take time for the sorcery of the Iron Crown to fade from Câr Bronach, you have done well to banish the foul shadow-grims at Eiglinn.
Shadow-grims can be found at Eiglinn in Câr Bronach.\n\nSummoned forth from the remnants of the Iron Crown's sorcery, shadow-grims roam the tainted lake of Eiglinn.
